problem.markdown:
>>A person living in a _______ country will tend to have a greater environmental impact. << [[(developed), developing]]
[explanation]
Resource use per person is greater in developed countries and lower in developing countries.
[explanation]
problem.p: A person living in a _______ country will tend to have a greater environmental impact.

optioninput.label: A person living in a _______ country will tend to have a greater environmental impact.

div.p: Resource use per person is greater in developed countries and lower in developing countries.
